pipeline.forgetmenot.name: Forget-Me-Not Shaders
config.forgetmenot.desc.sky_resolution: Resolution at which the sky is computed.
config.forgetmenot.desc.sky_upsample_fil: Uses an upsampling filter on the sky.
config.forgetmenot.desc.raytrace_ssr: Uses raymarching to give accurate reflections. Else will just flip the screen for reflections, which is inaccurate but faster.
config.forgetmenot.desc.simple_water: Uses simpler water normals. Enable this if looking at water makes your performance drop a bunch.
config.forgetmenot.desc.vanilla_lava: Enable for vanilla lava texture. Custom lava texture may have a minor performance impact.
config.forgetmenot.desc.clouds: Enables cheap 2D clouds. Can be very expensive!
config.forgetmenot.desc.stratus_clouds_s: Controls sharpness of the stratus cloud shape, ;lower for blurry-ish but faster clouds, higher for sharper but slower clouds.
config.forgetmenot.desc.cirrus_clouds_sh: Controls sharpness of the cirrus cloud shape, ;lower for blurry-ish but faster clouds, higher for sharper but slower clouds.
config.forgetmenot.desc.stratus_clouds: Cloud shape that resembles stratus clouds. Low performance cost.
config.forgetmenot.desc.cirrus_clouds: Cloud shape that resembles cirrus clouds. Low performance cost.
config.forgetmenot.desc.cloud_lighting: Cloud lighting mode. ;None - fastest;Normals - slow;Raymarched - slowest
config.forgetmenot.desc.emissive_boost: Brightness of emissive boost. Affects bloom and global illumination.
config.forgetmenot.desc.bloom_mix_factor: Bloom amount. 10 for 100 percent. Does not affect brightness of bloom, just the amount.
config.forgetmenot.desc.pixel_locked_gli: Locks the enchantment glint to the pixels of the texture. Similar to Bedrock edition glint.
config.forgetmenot.desc.danger_sight: Turns blocks more red when it is dark enough for mobs to spawn.
config.forgetmenot.desc.contrast: Adjusts contrast. 10 means no adjustment to contrast.
config.forgetmenot.desc.global_illuminat: Raytraces in screen space for global illumination. For colored lighting & ambient occlusion.
config.forgetmenot.desc.steps: Number of times to run the raytracing loop. 1 for decent colored light, 10 for ambient occlusion and good colored lights.
config.forgetmenot.desc.gi_range: Range of global illumination in blocks. 1 is good for gameplay, increase for better screenshots and longer range lighting.
config.forgetmenot.desc.gi_filter: Filter to reduce noise of global illumination. High performance impact.
config.forgetmenot.desc.gi_filter_qualit: Quality of the GI filter blur. High performance impact.
config.forgetmenot.desc.apply_mc_lightma: When disabled, won't apply vanilla lightmap.
config.forgetmenot.desc.vanilla_ao: Enables and disables Vanilla AO. Recommended to leave on.
config.forgetmenot.desc.directional_shad: Enables and disables directional sunlight shading.
